name: The Kazinga Channel
description: The Kazinga Channel is an oasis for many of the fascinating species that inhabit the park, and taking a boat tour along it gives visitors the chance to cruise just meters from hundreds of enormous hippos .

name: BIRDING IN LAKE MBURO NATIONAL PARK
description: Classified as an Important Birding Area (IBA) by Birding International, Queenâ€™s great variety of habitats mean it is home to over 600 species.

name: Sempaya Hot Springs
description: Most of the locals know the hot springs as Sempaya which originated from a Kiswahili phrase Sehemu mbaya (the difficult side) owing to the steep challenging rocks and terrain during the construction of the Fort Portal Bundibugyo road along the ridges of the Rwenzori Mountains.
